title: Rs 1,066 cr spent in 5 years for promoting new sustainable tech: Govt - Business Standard
content: Rs 1,066 cr spent in 5 years for promoting new sustainable tech: Govt  Business Standard
description: The government on Wednesday said Rs 1,086 crore has been allocated in the last five years for innovation of environmentally sustainable technology of which Rs 1,066 crore has been spent.
